articles.content: IndiGo Q2 Results: InterGlobe Aviation, the owner of Indias largest airline IndiGo, on Friday posted a profit after tax (PAT) of Rs 188.9 crore for the second quarter ended September 30, 2023, on the… [+1269 chars]

articles.title: Pharma stock jumps 6% after it reports net profit increase of 52.4% YoY - Trade Brains
